DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine proton radiation therapy reduce amount heart expose radiation , thereby decrease frequency and/or severity cardiac side effect .
DOC.brief_title: Proton Therapy Lymph Nodes Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirm invasive adenocarcinoma breast stage IIII ( TX , T04 , N03 ) medially locate tumor and/or axillary node invasion . Patients must undergo either mastectomy breast conservation surgery . Patients require axillary stag include sentinel node biopsy alone sentinel node negative . Patient must require peripheral lymph node radiation per physician discretion . Evidence distant metastasis ( M1 ) . Prior radiotherapy area interest . Prior history cardiovascular disease per physician discretion . Prior concurrent cancer nonmelanomatous skin cancer unless disease free least 5 year . Collagen vascular disease , specifically dermatomyositis CPK level normal active skin rash , systemic lupus erythematosis scleroderma .
